description:
The Drayden Short Sleeve Polo is a clean and classic everyday shirt with versatile style and incredible breathability. Made with Icebreaker’s breathable and odour-resistant jersey Cool-Lite™ fabric that helps manage sweat, the Drayden also features forward-set shoulder seams for reduced friction.

Soft merino and TENCEL™ Lyocell, a cellulose-based fibre derived from sustainable (FSC-certified) wood sources., combine to create Icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a fabric that helps to regulate your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, Icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker Drayden SS Polo - Mens
